item.title: how i built my portfolio
item.description:
your actual blog content starts here!

section heading

write whatever you want, normal text, code blocks, images etc.

more text here… code block


**The front matter (the `---` section at top) controls:**
- `title` → what shows as the card title on your blog list
- `description` → the subtitle under the card (like "A beginner's guide to the terminal")
- `image` → the big thumbnail image on the card (like your terminal screenshot)
- `draft: false` → makes it live, `true` hides it

**For images:**
Drop them in `/images/` folder and reference like above.

Can you open your existing `first_post.md` and share what's inside it? That way I can match the exact format your custom layout expects and give you a perfect template.
